pages.text: So you've created a spell, attached it to your staff, and are ready to cast spells? Great! Casting spells is easy, just hold your staff in your main hand, and press $(k:key.attack) and $(k:key.use).$(br2)You'll notice a square or circle depending on which button you pressed. $(k:key.attack) is for squares, $(k:key.use) is for circles.

When strung together into groups of 3, they're known as Spell Patterns. Each slot on your staff consists of one of these patterns, reaching a total of 8.$(br2)If you check the tooltip of your staff, or place it in a Crafting Table or Arcane Workbench, you can see the patterns associated with each slot!
